title: Cloak Line
summary: The Cloak Line was designed by the Syndicate to be fast, stealthy haulers.
full_text:
Cloak Line
The Cloak Line was designed by the Syndicate to be fast, stealthy haulers.
Small Hauler
Corvette
Frigate
Destroyer
T1
Cloak*
Veil
Shroud
Mantle**
T2
Exotic
*The Cloak does not exist ingame; instead, it is assumed to be due to the line's name.
**The Mantle is not a playable ship. Instead, it is the Syndicate's freighter model.
